aspect: - Family and friends of a man shot dead by police are shocked by a billboard featuring the officer who pulled the trigger.
- A billboard featuring a police officer and his dog has been erected in Wisconsin after the officer shot and killed a man.
- A billboard thanking the community for support after a shooting has caused outrage among the victim's family and friends.
- A billboard featuring a police officer has caused upset among the family of a man shot dead by the officer.
- Family and friends of a man shot dead by police want a billboard featuring the officer who pulled the trigger taken down.
explain: The aspect discusses the shock of the family and friends of Aaron Siler who was fatally shot by police officer Pablo Torres. What is particularly shocking to them is a billboard featuring the officer who pulled the trigger.
A billboard featuring a police officer and his dog has been erected in Wisconsin after the officer shot and killed a man.

A new development in the case of a police shooting in Wisconsin has sparked outrage among the victim's family and friends. A billboard erected by the Kenosha Police Union thanking the community for their support has been seen as tone-deaf by those close to the victim.
The billboard featuring a police officer has caused upset among family of a man shot dead by the officer.
The family and friends of a man shot dead by police want a billboard featuring the officer who pulled the trigger taken down.
